name: Drop Seed

ingredients.item: Appleton Estate Rare Blend 12 Year rum

preparation:
Any recipe featuring rare-blend rum from Appleton Estate is going to have a lot of flavor and complexity. Adding Averna amaro and allspice liqueur to the mix makes it even more irresistible.

Add all the ingredients into a mixing glass with ice, and stir until chilled.

Strain into a chilled coupe glass.

Express the oil of an orange peel over top, and drop in the peel to garnish.
